generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area next to the road where pedestrians are walking, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with commercial signage (e.g., "Sparda-Bank", "H&M", "SUBWAY") are visible along the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible on the left side of the image, partially obscuring the view of the buildings behind them.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and standing near the buildings.
- car: A black sedan and a white van are parked along the side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is partially visible on the far right side of the image, near the curb.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked in a row along the sidewalk, near the white van.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a "P" is visible on a pole near the sidewalk, indicating parking.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and possibly street lights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance on the left side of the image, mounted on a pole.
